mapper.select: SELECT m.msg_id, m.msg_user_id, m.msg_content, m.msg_serial, m.msg_level, m.msg_create_date, m.msg_active, m.msg_session, m.msg_intent, m.msg_action FROM la_message m inner join (select usr_id from la_user where usr_active=true and usr_session < now() - interval '5 minute') u on m.msg_user_id = u.usr_id inner join (select m.msg_user_id,min(m.msg_level) as msg_level from la_message m inner join (select msg_user_id,max(msg_session) as msg_session from la_message group by msg_user_id) ms on m.msg_user_id = ms.msg_user_id and m.msg_session = ms.msg_session and m.msg_active=true group by m.msg_user_id) ml on m.msg_user_id = ml.msg_user_id and m.msg_level=ml.msg_level order by msg_serial
